metadata.name: opportunity_market
metadata.description: Opportunity market with encrypted votes using Arcium

accounts.name: token_vault
docs: Token vault holding all wrapped tokens

accounts.name: token_vault_ata
docs: ATA owned by TokenVault PDA (source of pending tokens)

accounts.name: signer_token_account
docs: Signer's token account (destination for claimed tokens)

accounts.name: ephemeral_encrypted_token_account
docs: Ephemeral ETA to close (index != 0), must be owned by signer

accounts.name: market_token_ata
docs: Market's ATA holding reward tokens

accounts.name: owner_token_account
docs: Owner's token account to receive rewards

accounts.name: market_token_ata
docs: ATA owned by market PDA, holds reward tokens

accounts.name: source_encrypted_token_account
docs: Source ETA - must be a regular ETA (derived with index 0)

accounts.name: ephemeral_encrypted_token_account
docs: New ephemeral ETA - derived with index in seed

accounts.name: market_token_ata
docs: Market's ATA holding reward tokens

accounts.name: token_vault
docs: Token vault holding all wrapped tokens

accounts.name: token_vault_ata
docs: ATA owned by TokenVault PDA (source of SPL tokens for withdrawal)

accounts.name: user_token_account
docs: Signer's token account (destination for claimed tokens)

accounts.name: user_token_account
docs: User's token account to receive claimed SPL tokens

accounts.name: token_vault
docs: Token vault holding all wrapped tokens

accounts.name: token_vault_ata
docs: TokenVault's ATA holding SPL tokens (source for withdrawal)

accounts.name: token_mint
docs: Token mint for transfer_checked

accounts.name: token_program
docs: Token program for CPI

accounts.name: signer_token_account
docs: The signer's token account (source of SPL tokens)

accounts.name: token_vault
docs: Token vault holding all wrapped tokens

accounts.name: token_vault_ata
docs: ATA owned by the TokenVault PDA (destination of SPL tokens)

errors.name: InvalidTimestamp
errors.msg: Timestamp must be in the future

errors.name: TallyAlreadyIncremented
errors.msg: Tally already incremented for this share account

errors.name: InvalidMint
errors.msg: Token mint does not match market mint

errors.name: AlreadyPurchased
errors.msg: Shares already purchased for this share account

errors.name: DepositBelowMinimum
errors.msg: Deposit amount below minimum required for option creation

errors.name: AddOptionStakeFailed
errors.msg: Add option stake failed: insufficient balance, shares, or below minimum deposit

errors.name: UnstakeDelayNotMet
errors.msg: Unstake delay period has not passed yet

errors.name: ClosingEarlyNotAllowed
errors.msg: Market cannot be closed before stake period ends

types.name: AddOptionStakeOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.

types.name: BuyOpportunityMarketSharesOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.

types.name: ClockAccount
docs: An account storing the current network epoch

types.name: CloseEphemeralEncryptedTokenAccountOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.

types.name: ComputationDefinitionAccount
docs: An account representing a [ComputationDefinition] in a MXE.

types.name: ComputationDefinitionMeta
docs: A computation definition for execution in a MXE.

types.name: ComputationSignature
docs: The signature of a computation defined in a [ComputationDefinition].

types.name: Epoch
docs: The network epoch

types.name: MXEAccount
docs: A MPC Execution Environment.

types.name: MxeStatus
docs: The status of an MXE.

types.name: NodeMetadata
docs: location as [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html) country code

types.name: NodeRef
docs: A reference to a node in the cluster.
The offset is to derive the Node Account.
The current_total_rewards is the total rewards the node has received so far in the current
epoch.

fields.name: name
docs: Name of the option

fields.name: total_shares
docs: Total shares bought for this option (tally)

types.name: Output
docs: An output of a computation.
We currently don't support encrypted outputs yet since encrypted values are passed via
data objects.

types.name: Parameter
docs: A parameter of a computation.
We differentiate between plaintext and encrypted parameters and data objects.
Plaintext parameters are directly provided as their value.
Encrypted parameters are provided as an offchain reference to the data.
Data objects are provided as a reference to the data object account.

types.name: RevealSharesOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.

types.name: SetUnset
docs: Utility struct to store a value that needs to be set by a certain number of participants (keys
in our case). Once all participants have set the value, the value is considered set and we only
store it once.

types.name: UnstakeEarlyOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.

types.name: UnwrapEncryptedTokensOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.

types.name: WrapEncryptedTokensOutput
docs: The output of the callback instruction. Provided as a struct with ordered fields
as anchor does not support tuples and tuple structs yet.
